channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Health
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Health

item.title: CVE-2021-25506|2024-08-03T20:03:05.770Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20health
item.description: Non-existent provider in Samsung Health prior to 6.19.1.0001 allows attacker to access it via malicious content provider or lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2022-22283|2024-08-03T03:07:50.196Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20health
item.description: Improper session management vulnerability in Samsung Health prior to 6.20.1.005 prevents logging out from Samsung Health App.

item.title: CVE-2021-25425|2024-08-03T20:03:05.637Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20health
item.description: Improper check vulnerability in Samsung Health prior to version 6.17 allows attacker to read internal cache data via exported component.

item.title: CVE-2021-25401|2024-08-03T20:03:05.709Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20health
item.description: Intent redirection vulnerability in Samsung Health prior to version 6.16 allows attacker to execute privileged action.

item.title: CVE-2024-34597|2024-08-02T02:59:22.192Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20health
item.description: Improper input validation in Samsung Health prior to version 6.27.0.113 allows local attackers to write arbitrary document files to the sandbox of Samsung Health. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-34597|2024-07-02T09:23:37.348Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20health
item.description: Improper input validation in Samsung Health prior to version 6.27.0.113 allows local attackers to write arbitrary document files to the sandbox of Samsung Health. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-34597|2024-07-02T13:39:57.746Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20health
item.description: Improper input validation in Samsung Health prior to version 6.27.0.113 allows local attackers to write arbitrary document files to the sandbox of Samsung Health. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.
